bestPractices: Use determinate bars when percent is known; spinners for unknown durations.
Provide accessible labels (e.g., `aria-label` or nearby text) that explain what is loading.
Avoid blocking the entire page—prefer inline or section‑level indicators when possible.
Use theme colours to convey status (e.g., `error` for failures) and tokens for size.
Don’t rely solely on colour; pair with text or icons for critical states.
Keep motion subtle and aligned with the theme’s motion tokens.
